title: Format of the geometrical triangle-surface description.
description:
Description of the surfaces that form the boundaries of the object through which the sound waves travel.
Schema on github: https://github.com/Engineer2B/PowerCalculator-Schemas

Cylinders.description: Infinitely tall and cylindrical surface descriptions.

MediumName.description: Type of medium that the inward normal vector is pointing towards.

Radius.description: Radius of the cylinder in [m] (if ScaleFactor is 1).

Center.description: Center of the cylinder in [m, m, m] (if ScaleFactor is 1).

ShaftDirection.description: The direction the shaft is pointed towards, i.e. the direction that is perpendicular to the base plane of the cylinder

Planes.description: Infinite planar surfaces that are placed parallel to each other, i.e. if they don't all have the same normal vector, they will intersect yielding an incorrect topology.

MediumName.description: The unique name of the medium.

Center.description: Location of the center of the plane

Normal.description: Direction of the normal vector to the plane.

Nodes.description: The coordinates in space where the vertices/nodes of the mesh are located.

ElementIndices.description: Array of the id of the element and the three node indices which together make up a triangle of a mesh of a material.

MediumName.description: The unique name of the medium.

Id.description: Identifier for this surface. This identifier should be unique amongst all other objects.
